Index.section_six_one_title_th: ผงแป้งทัลคัม
Index.section_six_one_description: Powder derived from ground talc rock (Talc), which is a hydrated magnesium silicate mineral found naturally. Talc rock can form from hydrothermal reactions of dolomite and igneous rocks containing magnesium and silica. It is commonly used as a component in the cosmetics industry and can also be used as a filler in paper and plastic industries.
Index.section_six_two_description: An allotrope of carbon, commonly known as plumbago or black lead. It is a solid with crystalline sheets, opaque, soft, dark gray to black in color, soft texture, good conductor of heat and electricity. Commonly used in steel production, writing implements, heat loss reduction equipment, automotive brake components, and battery manufacturing.
Index.section_six_three_title_th: เวอร์มิคูไลท์
Index.section_six_three_description: A mineral containing various nutrients such as potassium, phosphorus, magnesium, and calcium. Lightweight, water-insoluble, good water retention and absorption, excellent root insulation. Can absorb nutrients and release them gradually, compatible with other growing media. Often used in soil preparation for plants, flowers, ornamentals, cacti, or hydroponic vegetables.
Index.section_six_four_title_th: แมกนีเซียมออกไซด์
Index.section_six_four_description: A white solid mineral, a metal oxide compound of magnesium. When dissolved in water, it creates an alkaline solution. Has many applications in industry, medicine, food, and agriculture, such as heat insulation materials, cement components for fire-resistant bricks, rubber manufacturing, petrochemicals, and cleaning agents.

description.title: Thai Chemical Marketing Co.,Ltd.
description.content: The company sells chemicals for industry, wastewater treatment chemicals, cleaning chemicals. It operates a business importing and distributing all types of chemicals, chemicals for industry, and other activities that use chemicals. Monday to Friday 08:00 - 17:00

We have customers both inside and outside industrial estates and general customers.

About.about_service_title: Consultation for selecting chemical products with express delivery service for manufacturing plants.
About.about_service_description: Serving industrial areas such as Samut Prakan, Samut Sakhon, Nakhon Pathom, Pathum Thani, and many others across Bangkok, Nonthaburi, and other provinces.
About.footer: Wholesale and retail chemical products: Talcum powder, Bentonite, Graphite, Magnesium Oxide, Vermiculite, Gypsum, Calcium Carbonate, Magnesium Carbonate, Titanium, etc. Available in small pack sizes.

Catalog.meta_title: Industrial Chemical Products Catalog | Thai Chemical Marketing Co., Ltd.
Catalog.meta_description: Wholesale industrial chemical supplies including talcum powder, bentonite, graphite, vermiculite, magnesium oxide, and ceramic materials for various industries such as ceramics, rubber, plastics, and paper.
Catalog.title: Product Catalog
Catalog.description: Explore the complete range of industrial-grade chemical products from Thai Chemical Marketing Co., Ltd. for commercial and manufacturing applications.
Catalog.keywords: Talcum Powder, Bentonite, Graphite, Magnesium Oxide, Vermiculite, Ceramic Powder, Calcium Carbonate, Industrial Chemicals Thailand

Talcum.name: Talcum Powder
Talcum.meta_title: Wholesale Talcum Powder | Cosmetic & Industrial Grade Talc | Thai Chemical
Talcum.meta_description: Premium talcum powder (325 & 1250 mesh) for cosmetics and industrial use. Ideal for body powders, fiberglass, resins, rubber, and ceramics. Nationwide delivery in Thailand.
Talcum.keywords: Talcum Powder, Cosmetic Talc, Industrial Talc, Talc 1250 mesh, Talc 325 mesh, Talc for Rubber, Talc for Resin, Talc Supplier Thailand, Body Powder Talc, Fiberglass Talc, Talc for Ceramics
Talcum.h2: High-Quality Talcum Powder at Wholesale Prices
Talcum.p: We supply high-quality talcum powder with fast shipping in Bangkok and surrounding provinces. Commonly used in cosmetics such as pressed powders and blush, as well as in fiberglass, resin, rubber, and ceramics. Talc offers excellent moisture absorption and skin comfort benefits.

Graphite.name: Graphite Powder
Graphite.meta_title: Graphite Powder Wholesale | Industrial Grade Conductive Carbon | Thai Chemical
Graphite.meta_description: High-purity graphite powder available at wholesale prices. Used in battery production, lubricants, brake pads, steel manufacturing, and thermal applications.
Graphite.keywords: Graphite Powder, Black Graphite, Conductive Graphite, Graphite for Battery, Graphite for Lubricants, Industrial Graphite, Wholesale Graphite Thailand, Graphite Supplier
Graphite.h2: Black Graphite Powder – Thermal & Electrical Conductor
Graphite.p: Our imported graphite powder is a highly effective heat and electricity conductor. Ideal for use in the steel industry, thermal media, battery production, lubricants, and brake pad manufacturing.

MgO.name: Magnesium Oxide Powder
MgO.meta_title: Magnesium Oxide Powder (MgO) Wholesale | Refractory & Feed Grade | Thai Chemical
MgO.meta_description: Wholesale magnesium oxide powder for refractory materials, fireproof cement, rubber production, ceramics, and animal feed additives. Available for fast delivery.
MgO.keywords: Magnesium Oxide, MgO Powder, Fireproof Cement Additive, MgO for Ceramics, MgO for Rubber, MgO for Feed, Industrial Magnesium Oxide Thailand
MgO.p: Used widely in the manufacture of fireproof cement, insulating bricks, ceramic production, rubber processing, and as a mineral supplement in animal feed. Available for fast delivery in Thailand.

Vermiculite.name: Vermiculite
Vermiculite.meta_title: Vermiculite for Hydroponics & Insulation | Wholesale in Thailand | Thai Chemical
Vermiculite.meta_description: Wholesale vermiculite for hydroponics, thermal insulation, fire resistance, soundproofing, and wall finishes. Water-retentive and pH neutral with essential nutrients for plants.
Vermiculite.keywords: Vermiculite, Hydroponic Growing Medium, Thermal Insulation, Fireproofing Material, Sound Absorption Material, Vermiculite Supplier Thailand, H-Beam Fire Protection, Agricultural Minerals
Vermiculite.p: Vermiculite is an alumino-silicate mineral ideal for hydroponic systems, insulation, fire protection, and soundproofing. It absorbs water well, remains pH neutral, and provides nutrients like potassium, magnesium, and calcium for plant growth.

Bentonite.name: Bentonite Powder
Bentonite.meta_title: Bentonite Powder Wholesale | Industrial, Cosmetic & Water Treatment | Thai Chemical
Bentonite.meta_description: Industrial-grade bentonite powder used in rubber, cosmetics, wastewater treatment, paper, and ceramic production. In-stock and ready for fast delivery.
Bentonite.keywords: Bentonite Powder, Industrial Bentonite, Bentonite for Rubber, Bentonite for Cosmetics, Bentonite for Water Treatment, Foundry Chemicals, Ceramic Additives
Bentonite.p: Our bentonite powder is widely used in rubber and cosmetic manufacturing, wastewater treatment, ceramic processing, and paper production. It is effective in heavy metal removal and acts as a thickening and binding agent.

Ceramic.name: Ceramic Powder
Ceramic.meta_title: Ceramic Powder Wholesale | High-Temp Ceramic Coatings | Thai Chemical
Ceramic.meta_description: Ceramic powder for producing ceramic glazes and high-temperature ceramic coatings. Suitable for industrial kilns and ceramic product manufacturing.
Ceramic.keywords: Ceramic Powder, Ceramic Glazes, Ceramic Pigments, High-Temperature Ceramics, Industrial Ceramic Materials, Ceramic Raw Materials
Ceramic.p: We supply ceramic powders used in high-temperature applications such as ceramic coatings, glazes, and pigments for industrial ceramic manufacturing.

Food_chemical.name: Food Grade Chemicals
Food_chemical.meta_title: Food Industry Chemicals | Certified Feed Additives | Thai Chemical
Food_chemical.meta_description: Food-grade chemicals certified by the Department of Livestock Development for animal feed and aquaculture use. Clean, contaminant-free, and safe for consumption.
Food_chemical.keywords: Food Grade Chemicals, Feed Additives, Chemicals for Aquaculture, Shrimp Farm Chemicals, Certified Feed Ingredients Thailand
Food_chemical.h2: Safe & Clean Additives for Feed Production
Food_chemical.p: Our food-grade chemicals are ideal for animal feed production and aquaculture farms. Certified safe, contamination-free, and compliant with industry standards.

Swimming_pool.name: Swimming Pool Chemicals
Swimming_pool.meta_title: Swimming Pool Treatment Chemicals | Wholesale in Thailand | Thai Chemical
Swimming_pool.meta_description: Pool treatment chemicals for disinfection and water quality control. Wholesale pricing and fast delivery available across Thailand.
Swimming_pool.keywords: Swimming Pool Chemicals, Pool Disinfectants, Pool Water Control, Chlorine for Pools, Pool Maintenance Chemicals, Pool Chemical Supplier Thailand
Swimming_pool.p: We offer a range of swimming pool chemicals including disinfectants and water balancing agents. Expert consultation available for industrial-scale pool management, with fast delivery across key industrial zones.
